mapper.insert: insert into follow (FOLLOW_NO, MEMBER_ID, FOLLOW_TARGET_TYPE, FOLLOW_TARGET_PRIMARY_KEY, FOLLOW_TIME) values (follow_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{followTargetType}, #{followTargetPrimaryKey}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from follow where member_id = #{memberId} and follow_target_type = #{followTargetType} and follow_target_primary_key = #{followTargetPrimaryKey}
mapper.delete: delete from follow where member_id = #{memberId} and follow_target_type = #{followTargetType} and follow_target_primary_key = #{followTargetPrimaryKey}
mapper.select:
select * from follow
and instr(member_id, #{memberId}) > 0
and instr(follow_target_type, #{followTargetType}) > 0
order by follow_target_primary_key desc
